entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0200 is misreported and its editorconfig setting affects IDE0039 #65504
  • Inline diagnostics in the editor do not get cleared up #65503
  • Big tagger delay in refreshing squiggles in the editor #65502
    17.5
  • Performance improvements for FixAll diagnostic computation for syntax-only analyzers #65501
  • Unable to reference netmodule #65499
    17.5
  • Formatting for stackalloc as a parameter lost one indentation #65498
  • C# Extract Method refactoring failed if "Not all code paths return" #65496
    17.5

Closed

  • Swapping with tuple deconstruction compiles to inferior IL code compared to using a temporary variable #53300
    17.5
  • Improve NormalizeWhitespace for object initializers #61204
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33118.127 #65509
  • Code CleanUp doesnt not work as expected #62727
    17.4
  • Test Plan for "List Patterns" #51289
    17.1
  • DocumentationCommentId parser throws IndexOutOfRangeException when parsing type parameter symbol in invalid ID #65396
    17.5
  • Roslyn fails to give syntax error for incomplete member that contains a lexical warning #13719
    Compiler.Next
  • Disallow optional parameter attributes in lambdas #59770
    C# 12.0
  • Inferred delegate type for method group should include any default parameter values #61007
    C# 12.0
  • Local constant is considered unused when it's used as default parameter value for local function #62161
    Compiler.Next
  • Unused Variable Analysis Does Not Account for Local Function Default Parameter Values #63837
    Backlog
  • Default Parameter Values Not Supported By QuickInfo for Anonymous Delegate Types #63890
    Backlog
  • Lambda parameters are not checked for a number of error conditions #62960
    17.5
  • CS0721 error reported on unintuitive location #61831
    Backlog
  • Documentation Xml does not contain documentation from Source Generators generated code #65426
    17.5
  • [LSP] Always create lsp misc files and resolve rps regression #57243
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve consistency in our parser code. #65508
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure lvalue struct receivers are not copied by value due to interpolated string handler rewrite #65505
    Area-Compilers
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65500
    Area-Compilers
  • VB: Verify BoundNodes can be rewritten without updates #65497
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65495
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Optimize codegen for tuple swap scenarios #65327
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move context-sensitive parsing to context-free parsing. #65480
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add A/B test to allow us to turn off background compilation/parsing #65489
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Run the conditional-token-placement fixer on roslyn #65469
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65453
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Check type parameter index bounds when parsing `DocumentationCommentId` #65457
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Convert parser warning into a binding warning. #65440
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block #65452
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Warn for unused parameters in source #65466
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65413
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Pass in HostServices when creating the LSP server #65384
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65511
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65510
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add lambda defaults/`params` tests from the test plan review #65458
    Area-Compilers
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix bug in partial solutions after a document was removed and added #65349
    Area-IDE
  • Do not import the VSWorkspace during Roslyn package initialization #65492
    Area-IDE
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Show explicit error message when extracting interface from module #65152
    Area-IDE
  • Add additional cases whre 'use coalesce expression' can simplify code. #65371
    Area-IDE
  • Add experimental formatting option to control placement of `=>` #65476
    Area-IDE
  • Fix a NullReferenceException in Signature help #65372
    Area-IDE
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecessary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [PERF] Do not force Compilation.GetDiagnostics for FixAll of syntax-only analyzers #65483
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Tenet-Performance
  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Trampoline to a base method implementation when deleting an override #65481
    Area-Compilers
  • Create new vsix for arm64 and x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce tagging work in files without raw strings #65488
    Area-IDE
